title: Ten million strong
brief_description: Shows the different ways of life of the various racial groups in Malaysia, and demonstrates that Malaysia is divided more by the contrast between rich and poor than by racial prejudice.
description: Shows the different ways of life of the various racial groups in Malaysia, and demonstrates that Malaysia is divided more by the contrast between rich and poor than by racial prejudice.
